android.car.admin

类 CarDevicePolicyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.admin.CarDevicePolicyManager

  • public final class CarDevicePolicyManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Public interface for managing policies enforced on a device.

    This is a sub-set of android.app.admin.DevicePolicyManager, but with the following differences:

    1. Its methods take in consideration driver-safety restrictions.
    2. Callers don't need to be a DPC, but rather have the proper permissions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • removeUser

        public RemoveUserResult removeUser(UserHandle user)
        Removes the given user.

        Note: if the caller user is not an admin, it can only remove itself (otherwise it will fail with RemoveUserResult.STATUS_FAILURE_INVALID_ARGUMENTS).

        参数:
        user - identification of the user to be removed.
        返回:
        whether the user was successfully removed.

      • createUser

        public CreateUserResult createUser(java.lang.String name,
                                   int type)
        Creates a user with the given characteristics.

        Note: if the caller user is not an admin, it can only create non-admin users (otherwise it will fail with CreateUserResult.STATUS_FAILURE_INVALID_ARGUMENTS).

        参数:
        name - user name.
        type - either USER_TYPE_REGULAR, USER_TYPE_ADMIN, or USER_TYPE_GUEST.
        返回:
        whether the user was successfully removed.

      • startUserInBackground

        @Deprecated
public StartUserInBackgroundResult startUserInBackground(UserHandle user)
        已过时。 Use android.car.user.CarUserManager#startUser(UserStartRequest) instead.
        Starts a user in the background.
        参数:
        user - identification of the user to be started.
        返回:
        whether the user was successfully started.

      • stopUser

        @Deprecated
public StopUserResult stopUser(UserHandle user)
        已过时。 Use android.car.user.CarUserManager#stopUser(UserStopRequest) instead.
        Stops the given user.
        参数:
        user - identification of the user to stop.
        返回:
        whether the user was successfully stopped.

      • setUserDisclaimerShown

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
